mapper.select: SELECT IDX, CATEGORY, CRE_NM, TITLE, INTRO, TARGET_AMT, START, END , case when (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LIKE_TB WHERE PJ_IDX = P.IDX AND USER_ID = #{SESSIONID}) = 1 THEN 'heart_fill.svg' ELSE 'heart.svg' END AS HEART FROM PROJECT_TB P WHERE IDX = #{IDX}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LIKE_TB ( IDX , PJ_IDX , USER_ID) VALUES ( (SELECT NUM FROM (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(IDX), 0) + 1 AS NUM FROM LIKE_TB) A) , #{PJ_IDX} , #{USER_ID} )
